articles.title: KAPPC Spokesman Rejects Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution"
articles.content:
KAPPC Spokesman Rejects Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution"
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee issued the following statement on Tuesday:
					 The U.S., the most shameful gangster-like state in the world, and the riffraff submitting to it blindly deterred by its high-handed practices committed an international crime of cooking up the "sanctions resolution" 2371 by abusing the name of the UN Security Council on Sunday.
					
					 As soon as the adoption of "sanctions resolution" at the UNSC, U.S. President Trump acted as if he achieved a great thing, saying that it would give very big economic shock to the DPRK and he extended thanks to China and Russia for cooperation in adopting the "resolution". The U.S. ambassador to the UN and other underlings are talking such nonsense that the "north's regime would have to pay dearly for persistently developing its nuclear weapons and missiles.
					
					 Japanese Prime Minister Abe is talking rhetoric that he highly appreciated the "resolution" as one clearly reflecting the will of the international community demanding a higher level of pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 Big countries that showed their hands in favor of adopting the "resolution", scared by the U.S. sanctions threats to them, are letting loose clumsy excuses, saying that it is necessary to take sanctions against the DPRK but the final target is the settlement of the issue through negotiations.
					
					 Even the poor south Korean puppet regime is impudently uttering, urging the DPRK to seriously accept the united warning from the international community and immediately stop the reckless provocation threatening world peace and security.
					
					 However, the recent "sanctions resolution" cooked up by the U.S. and its followers is an outcome of the horror and uneasiness of the U.S. taken aback by the might and mettle of the DPRK, which towered high as the nuclear power of Juche and a world military power, and the last-ditch efforts of the hostile forces under the pretext of the "international community". It is also the label of the weakness and servility of the riffraff who showed their hands in favor of adopting the "resolution" as they are scared by the U.S., old wolf, though understanding that it is immoral.
					
					  The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee clarifies the following stand, in reflection of the fixed faith and strong retaliatory will of our army and people who want peace and security in the region and the rest of the world;
					
					 1. We totally and resolutely reject the recent "sanctions resolution", cooked up by the gangster-like U.S. imperialists in collusion with its blind followers, as hideous terrorism against the dignified DPRK.
					
					 In any page of UN Charter and international code there can be found no article stipulating that a country's step for military strength to defend its dignity and sovereignty may be called into question.
					
					 Like all the past anti-DPRK "resolutions" cooked up at the UN, the recent "sanctions resolution" is a criminal and illegal document, invented by the gangster-like U.S., the sworn enemy of the Korean people, and passed by the UNSC which has turned into a tool of evil infected with extreme prejudice and injustice, bereft of its inborn mission and duty as a body responsible for global peace and security, and into a puppet acting on the hands of the U.S. and other big powers. We do not regard the "resolution" as much as wastepaper and the absurd call for its implementation as much as bark of a dog at the moonlit night.
					
					 Nothing will be more foolish than to expect that such "resolution", little short of a document of crimes, will give a great "shock" and result in something.
					
					 2. Now that gangster-like act has reached its height to ruthlessly violate the sovereignty and rights to existence and development of the DPRK, the substantial action of justice by its army and people will follow to defend them.
					
					 The times have changed and the world is getting awakened.
					
					 The world political structure is radically changing according to the aspiration of the awakened people. And the overall national strength and strategic position of the DPRK have been remarkably increased.
					
					 Under such circumstances, packs of wolves are coming in attack to strangle a nation. The Korean army and people will never remain an onlooker to such practice.
					
					 They should be mindful that the DPRK's strategic steps accompanied by physical action will be taken mercilessly with the mobilization of all its national strength.
					
					 3. Taking this opportunity we call on all countries and peoples to turn out in foiling the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. and its followers which abused the name of the UN against the world conscience and building a new just and stable world order.
					
					 Assertions of big powers are not always right and majority cannot represent justice at all.
					
					 In the Middle Ages, there were only a few people who advocated the Copernican Theory and the majority opposed and incriminated it. But the truth was proved along with history.
					
					 Those countries, which were thanked by Trump and gained gratitude of the U.S. this time for supporting the illicit "resolution", pursuant to its policy, after dropping their creed, conscience and obligation, should feel shame before the world conscience, deeply reflect on their wrongdoings in the stern court of history and mankind and pay dearly for them.
					
					 All countries and peoples in the world opposing war and loving peace should courageously turn out in the struggle against imperialism and the U.S. in order to set right the present unfair international order where injustice lords it over justice and high-handed and ego-driven practice prevails over truth and to build a new righteous and peaceful world.
					
					 We declare before the world once again our iron will to straightly advance along the road of simultaneously developing the two fronts without a moment's stop or vacillation, keenly realizing how just we were when we decided to take the path of bolstering the nuclear force, now that the U.S.-led hostile forces are running wild to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will resolutely smash by dint of justice the illicit "sanctions resolution" cooked up by the brigandish U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: FM Ri Yong Ho Makes Speech at Ministerial Meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum
articles.content:
FM Ri Yong Ho Makes Speech at Ministerial Meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho made a speech at the Ministerial Meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum held in Manila, Philippines on August 7. 
					 Noting it is important above all to establish a right view with correct understanding of the essence of the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula, he said:
					
					 To all intents and purposes, the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula is the one that was created and developed into the present phase today because of the U.S. whose responsibility also solely lies with the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK's possession of nukes and ICBM is a legitimate option for self-defence in the face of clear and real nuclear threat posed by the U.S. against the DPRK.
					
					 However, the U.S. rigged up several "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK at the UN Security Council, thus disguising the issue as one between the DPRK and UN.
					
					 Had it not been the hostile policy enforced by the U.S. for more than 70 years against the DPRK since the first day of its founding and had that policy not been intensified with an undisguised nuclear blackmail and threat, the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula would not have come into being from the beginning. 
					
					 To our people who experienced disastrous disturbances of war on the Korean peninsula by the U.S., the powerful war deterrence for national defense is an inevitable strategic option and it is a precious strategic asset that can neither be reversed nor bartered for anything.
					
					 We will, under no circumstances, put the nukes and ballistic rockets on negotiating table. Neither shall we flinch even an inch from the road to bolstering up the nuclear forces chosen by ourselves, unless the hostile policy and nuclear threat of the U.S. against the DPRK are fundamentally eliminated.
					
					 This time also, the U.S. fabricated a new "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK in the UN Security Council. The DPRK has already made its position clear that it will respond with strong follow-up measures and acts of justice.
					
					 The DPRK which relies on self-reliance and self-development as its mode of existence can fully counter the hostile policy and acts of the U.S. Should the U.S. pounce upon the DPRK with military force at last, the DPRK is ready to teach the U.S. a severe lesson with its nuclear strategic force it has so far shown in detail.

articles.title: Ministerial Meeting of ASEAN Regional Forum Held
articles.content:
Ministerial Meeting of ASEAN Regional Forum Held
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Ministerial Meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum was held in Manilla of Phillipines on August 6-7.
					 Attending it were 27 delegations from countries and regions, including the DPRK delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho and 10 ASEAN member states.
					
					 Peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region were discussed at the meeting.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho delivered a speech there.
					
					 In the speech, he clarified the principled stand that the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons and ICBM is a just and legitimate self-defensive option to cope with the clear and real nuclear threat of the United States against the DPRK and that the DPRK would not flinch even an inch from the road chosen by itself, the road of bolstering up its nuclear force.
					
					 Meanwhile, Ri Yong Ho met with foreign ministers of several countries including China, Russia and Philippines and exchanged views on bilateral relations and important international issues.
					
					 In the meetings he emphasized that the DPRK categorically rejected the new "sanctions resolution" against it adopted by the UN Security Council, a product of nefarious plot to isolate and stifle the DPRK, and would in the future, too, march straight forward to the end on the road chosen by itself without the slightest deviation, under the uplifted banner of the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts which is the lasting banner of safeguarding peace.

articles.title: ASEAN Committee Here Hosts Reception
articles.content:
ASEAN Committee Here Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The ASEAN Committee hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Tuesday to mark the 50th anniversary of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN).
					 Present there on invitation were Minister of External Economic Relations Kim Yong Jae, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Ri Kil Song, Vice-Director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps Mun Jae Chol, officials concerned and representatives of foreign embassies and international bodies here.
					
					 On hand were Indonesian Ambassador Bambang Hiendrasto, chairman of the ASEAN Committee; Pham Viet Hung, Vietnamese ambassador; Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador; Sin Bunthoeurn, Cambodian ambassador; and embassy officials of ASEAN countries to the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Talks between Agricultural Ministers of DPRK and Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Talks between Agricultural Ministers of DPRK and Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between Ko In Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet and minister of Agriculture of the DPRK, and Victor Grange Mehile, minister of Agriculture, Animal Husbandry and Food of Equatorial Guinea who is heading its government delegation, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were officials concerned and from the opposite side was a member of the government delegation of Equatorial Guinea.
					
					 At the talks both sides discussed the matter of boosting cooperative relations between the two countries in agriculture.

articles.title: Equatorial Guinean Government Delegation Feted
articles.content:
Equatorial Guinean Government Delegation Feted
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government Tuesday gave a reception in honor of the visiting government delegation of Equatorial Guinea.
					 Present there on invitation was the delegation led by Victor Grange Mehile, minister of Agriculture, Animal Husbandry and Food.
					
					 Ko In Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet and minister of Agriculture, and officials concerned were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Venezuela
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Venezuela
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho on Monday sent a congratulatory message to Jorge Alberto Arreaza Montserrat on his appointment as foreign minister of the People's Power of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela.
					 The message extended full support and solidarity to the just struggle of the government and people of Venezuela to reject the U.S. and its vassal forces' interference, achieve the country's peace and political stability and realize the cause of Hugo Chavez Frias, eternal commander of the Bolivarian Revolution of Venezuela.
					
					 It wished him success in his new job, expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the governments and peoples of the two countries would grow stronger in the common struggle for independence and socialism against imperialism.

articles.title: Canadian PM's Special Envoy Arrives
articles.content:
Canadian PM's Special Envoy Arrives
Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Daniel Jean, national security advisor to the prime minister of Canada who is special envoy of the Canadian prime minister, and his party arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Here to Attend Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Here to Attend Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association who is co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and his party and a delegation of the Danish Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu led by Johnny Mortensen arrived here Tuesday to take part in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- New Stamps (two sheets, a sheetlet and an individual) were issued in the DPRK in commemoration of the successful test-fire of intercontinental ballistic missile Hwasong-14.
					 Seen on their upper parts are letters "Successful Test Launch of Intercontinental Ballistic Missile Hwasong-14".
					
					 A sheet carries an image of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un autographing the order to carry out the test launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 on its center surrounded by pictures of the fluttering flag of the Workers' Party of Korea, his written order and the ICBM soaring into the sky.
					
					 The other sheet brings an image of the respected supreme leader declaring the success in the test-fire, against pictures of the DPRK flag, the ICBM Hwasong-14 trailing flame in the sky and the globe.
					
					 The sheetlet deals with preparatory stages for the test-fire and the individual stamp shows a picture of ICBM Hwasong-14 launched into the sky.
					
					 All those stamps represent that the success in the test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14, a breakthrough into the final gate to rounding off the national nuclear force, is a great victory won by Juche Korea in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. showdown.

articles.title: Nuclear Weapons of Justice Will Destroy Nuclear of Tyranny
articles.content:
Nuclear Weapons of Justice Will Destroy Nuclear of Tyranny
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its minions recently cooked up "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK at the United Nations Security Council which is geared to completely block the DPRK's economic development and improvement of its people's livelihood.
					 Upon receiving the news, the army and people of the DPRK are condemning and rejecting the "sanctions resolution" as flagrant infringement upon the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 Sin Kwang Jin, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 The U.S. is getting more impatient for the DPRK's nuclear deterrent, but it can not be construed otherwise than its recognition of the victory won by the DPRK.
					
					 It is a mistake for the U.S., quite ignorant of the DPRK, to think that sanction is almighty. The DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrent is not the product of favorable condition or surroundings, but the one it has developed with the sprit of self-reliance and self-development, despite of the U.S. heinous moves to stifle and blockade it. Therefore, our nuclear weapons of justice will mercilessly hammer the nuclear of tyranny.
					
					 Ho Nam Chol, a faculty dean of Kim Chol Ju University of Education, said:
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. who brings a dark cloud of nuclear war to the Korean peninsula and jeopardizes peace and security in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 The U.S. has staged a series of joint military drills against the DPRK with various strategic nuclear strike means like nuclear submarines and nuclear strategic bombers involved. That is why the DPRK has built and bolstered up its nuclear deterrence in quality and quantity.
					
					 So Song Il, director of an institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, said:
					
					 The U.S. has remained unchanged in posing nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK for over half a century, but it only propelled the DPRK to nuclear weapons state. And its persistent anti-DPRK hostile policy drives the DPRK into accelerating the modernization of nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK will further demonstrate its dignity and might as an independent nuclear power, invincible military power.

articles.title: DPRK People Condemn "Sanctions Resolution" Adopted at UNSC
articles.content:
DPRK People Condemn "Sanctions Resolution" Adopted at UNSC
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S. and its servile forces cooked up "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK at the United Nations Security Council, which drives all the people of the DPRK into great fury.
					 Kim Hwang Ho, department director of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 The "sanctions resolution", to all intents and purposes, is a flagrant infringement upon the DPRK's sovereignty as well as an open challenge to it.
					
					 At the bottom of injustice and double standard rampant in the present world are the U.S. and those countries which were offered "thanks" from the former as a reward for taking part in the conspiracy to invent the heinous "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK.
					
					 In the past 60-odd years, the DPRK has been taking due measures to strengthen its self-defensive nuclear deterrence in order to counter the policy of hostility and nuclear threat against it from the U.S. Terming these measures "a threat to international peace and security" is a gangster-like logic indicating that the rest of the world should either become U.S. colonies serving its interests or fall victim to its aggression.
					
					 The countries, that openly pursue their ambition to maintain permanent nuclear hegemony by conducting most of the nuclear tests in the world and launching ICBM whenever they please, are adopting illegal and unlawful "sanctions resolutions" to incriminate the DPRK's bolstering of self-defensive nuclear force. This constitutes the height of outrageous double standard.
					
					 We, the working class in the field of the metallurgical industry, would produce more steel with the spirit of self-reliance and self-development, full of determination to hammer the U.S. imperialists who are clinging to base means and methods.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Wrong Decision of S. Korean Court
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Wrong Decision of S. Korean Court
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the puppet Seoul Central District Court of south Korea gave a decision on light punishment upon the culprits of the case of blacklisted persons of culture and arts, sparking uproar of different social standings.
					 The case which jolted whole south Korea is that of fascist suppression and violation of human rights unprecedented in history. The south Korean authorities put more than 8 000 progressive persons of culture and arts on the blacklist and suppressed them under the direct instruction and control of traitor Park Geun Hye. 
					
					 The puppet Seoul Central District Court sentenced to light punishment seven persons responsible for the case, including Kim Ki Chun, former presidential chief of staff of Chongwadae, and Jo Yun Son, former minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism, saying that "the state administration's keynote of the Park Geun Hye regime calling for removal of the leftists and aid to the rightists has not been recognized as illegality". Even it set free Jo under the pretext of probation.
					
					 The unfair decision on the top-class criminals who organized and implemented political terror shading the modern witch hunting is an intolerable mockery and wanton challenge to the mindset of the candlelight demonstrators.
					
					 Through the decision, the puppet court revealed once again its true colors as political waiting maid serving the fascist dictatorship forces, the conservative group of traitors.
					
					 The puppet judicial authorities staged illegal trials in the whole period of traitor Park Geun Hye's office.
					
					 Here are typical examples. They are the case of rebellion plot of Ri Sok Gi, a lawmaker from the former Unified Progressive Party, on the sedition charge and the case of the Intelligence Service's interference in the presidential election which gave a verdict of not guilty to the director of IS for the illogical reason that he did not involve himself in the election but intervened in politics.
					
					 After the regime change, the puppet judicial authorities continue to read the face of the conservative group of traitors, pretending to follow the mindset of the candlelight demonstrators.
					
					 Dismissing the arrest warrant for the vice-president of Samsung Electronics, accomplice of the case of influence peddling in the "state affairs" in January, and the formal decision on the culprits of the current case of blacklisted persons of culture and arts are a revelation of the sinister attempt to affect the trial of traitor Park Geun Hye to reduce her crimes and dodge heavy penalty.
					
					 The puppet court is one of the evils to be removed as it imposed heavy penalties upon the people who conducted just acts for independence, democracy and reunification and showed leniency to the rascals who committed crimes against democracy and human rights.
					
					 The puppet court should clearly see the mindset of the angry public contending that "the court should give proper decision before another candlelight action" or "the popular masses will turn out in the drive for judicial reform."

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Spreading "Story of Crisis in August"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Spreading "Story of Crisis in August"
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are spreading a "story of crisis in August".
					 In short, possibility of the Trump administration's "military option" increased as the DPRK's successful second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14 passed over the "red line" of the U.S., and "the north would make another tougher military step" on the occasion of the joint military drill Ulji Freedom Guardian scheduled in late August.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This is the cunning trick to lay the blame for the tension on the Korean peninsula at the door of the DPRK and justify their reckless military confrontation racket.
					
					 It is not the DPRK but the U.S. and its lackeys south Korean authorities that bring crisis to this land.
					
					 Now is the time for the south Korean authorities to behave with prudence and self-control, not going busy with currying favor with the master as the DPRK clearly showed the world the powerful might of its strategic nuclear force capable of wiping out aggressors and provokers at one go anywhere anytime.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities are escalating anti-DPRK confrontation racket, availing themselves of the U.S. "military counteraction" to seriously irritate the DPRK.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities continue to aggravate the situation while taking issue with the DPRK's steps for self-defence as a shock brigade of the U.S. in its moves to stifle the DPRK, depending on the master, no more than a toothless wolf, the "story of crisis in August" of public concern at home and abroad will unfold before their eyes. It would be easy to guess what the consequences will be. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities want to escape catastrophic disaster, they had better stop at once staging the confrontation racket at our doorstep and halt their rash actions.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Working as Shock Brigade for Carrying out U.S. War of Aggression
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Working as Shock Brigade for Carrying out U.S. War of Aggression
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are making no scruple of joining in the U.S. which dropped A-bombs over Japan and did a great deal of harm to it in the past, and working hard to realize their long-ambition for turning it into a military giant and for overseas militarist aggression by the method of taking advantage of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and strategy to dominate Asia. But this is no more than action of tiger moths perishing in the flames.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This year marks 72nd anniversary since Japan suffered the drop of A-bombs by the U.S.
					
					 The Japanese people and the whole world clearly remember the horrible disaster that hundreds of thousands of people lost their lives and many areas were contaminated with radio-active substance and turned into a barren land owing to the A-bombs the U.S. dropped over Hiroshima and Nagasaki.
					
					 Humankind has conducted a dynamic struggle for peace against war for putting an end to a nuclear war and achieving lasting peace, shaking with rage at the barbarities committed by the U.S. imperialists in Japan.
					
					 Japan, however, appeared a shock brigade and servants for the war of aggression of the U.S. imperialists, swimming against the trend of times, only to spark the anger of the international community.
					
					 It can never be a good opportunity for Japan to see the situation on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia got tense due to the U.S. 
					
					 If a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula, not only the mainland of the U.S., the belligerent party of the DPRK, but also Japan Archipelago can never be safe.
					
					 For their security and future, the Japanese reactionaries should stop foolish acts of working  hard as a shock brigade and servants for carrying out aggressive war of the U.S. which inflicted painful wounds upon the Japanese people in past.

articles.title: U.S. Should Not Remain Indifferent to DPRK Warning: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Should Not Remain Indifferent to DPRK Warning: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- If the Yankees brandish the nuclear stick on this land again despite our repeated warnings, we will clearly teach them how to behave with the nuclear strategic force which we have shown them one by one so far, says Minju Joson in a commentary Tuesday.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 It is now easy for the DPRK to strike the mainland of the U.S.
					
					 It is the American authorities who have made themselves miserable.
					
					 The U.S. has blackmailed the DPRK with nukes and threatened its right to existence by imposing harsh economic sanctions upon the DPRK for decades.
					
					 The U.S. trumpeting about war and extreme sanctions and threats against the DPRK only emboldened the latter and offered a good excuse for its access to nukes.
					
					 The war deterrence which the DPRK paid dearly for is an inevitable strategic option and it is a precious strategic asset that can not be bartered for anything.
					
					 To the DPRK, the U.S. is no longer the country which is far from the former across the ocean.
					
					 The DPRK is grabbing the whole territory of the U.S. with the will to punish the U.S., a devil incarnation.
					
					 If the U.S., which is at DPRK's beck and call due to its strong force, persists in the stupid action, the DPRK will react to it with decisive act of justice as already declared.

articles.title: Unfair Decision of S. Korean Court Denounced
articles.content:
Unfair Decision of S. Korean Court Denounced
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the puppet Seoul Central District Court of south Korea gave a decision upon the culprits of the case of blacklisted persons of culture and arts.
					 According to the decision, Kim Ki Chun, former presidential chief of staff of Chongwadae under the Park Geun Hye regime, and other culprits were sentenced to light punishment such as prison terms of three years to one year and six months. Meanwhile, Jo Yun Son, former minister of the Culture, Sports and Tourism, was sentenced to one year in prison but he was set free on the pretext of probation.
					
					 This is an anti-historical act of acquitting the criminals who heinously challenged the democratic forces and an unpardonable insult to the mindset of candlelight demonstrators, Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The reality seriously tells the south Korean people once again that the puppet court is the one of evils to be removed as it imposed heavy penalties upon the people who did righteous acts for independence, democracy and reunification and showed leniency to the rascals who committed crimes against democracy and human rights.
					
					 Severe punishment of history and miserable end await the traitors who opposed the mindset of people.
					
					 Those of the puppet court should clearly see the angry people shouting "the court should give proper decision before another candlelight action" and "the popular masses will turn out in the drive for judicial reform."
					
					 South Korean people from all walks of life will launch a more vigorous struggle to mete out a severe punishment to the Park Geun Hye group of traitors as they know well that if they allow the wrong decision, they will be deprived of the gains of the candlelight action and dark era where the fascist dictatorship forces dominate the people would come again.

articles.title: S. Koreans Stage Demo to Get Prisoners of Conscience Released
articles.content:
S. Koreans Stage Demo to Get Prisoners of Conscience Released
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Citizens from different walks of life in south Korea, including the families of prisoners of conscience and members of the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and citizens, staged a demonstration urging the release of all prisoners of conscience in Seoul on Aug. 5, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 The demonstrators marched from the plaza of Kwanghwamun to the road leading to Chongwadae, chanting such slogans as "Set free all prisoners of conscience".

articles.title: DPRK's Victory Day Marked in Britain, Switzerland and Romania
articles.content:
DPRK's Victory Day Marked in Britain, Switzerland and Romania
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting, seminar and book and photo exhibition took place in Britain, Switzerland and Romania from July 15 to 29 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 On display at the venue of the book and photo exhibition were photos dealing with President Kim Il Sung's exploits for war victory.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Present at the events were personages of various circles and masses in relevant countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) said:
					
					 It is only the DPRK which is standing against the U.S. in the world.
					
					 The past Korean war and confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. in the postwar period go to prove that it is not just country with big land and population that wins victory.
					
					 The DPRK has a powerful weapon called the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses which no other country in the world could ever possess.
					
					 Even though the second Korean war breaks out, the U.S. imperialists and their followers can never break the Korean people's faith and will.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee said that it was the brilliant fruition of Songun politics pursued by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un that a war has not broken out on the Korean peninsula during more than six decades after the Korean war.
					
					 The secretary general of the Romania－Korea Friendship Association stressed that today the DPRK is displaying its might as a powerful nuclear weapons state in the East and a country possessed of ICBM under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Ugandan Body
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Ugandan Body
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- The Uganda Farm and Agro-Based Workers' Union sent a letter to the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea on July 25 to congratulate the 64th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and the DPRK's success in the test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 Warmly congratulating the service personnel and people of the DPRK on their V-Day, the letter said:
					
					 We pay high tribute to President Kim Il Sung, ever-victorious iron-willed commander who exploded the U.S. imperialists' myth of "mightiness" and to leader Kim Jong Il who defended socialism and destiny of the nation under the unfurled banner of Songun.
					
					 We also offer sincere regards to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who let the DPRK rapidly emerge as a nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher possessed of SLBM and led the test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 to success.
					
					 We extend invariable support and solidarity to the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and all agricultural workers of the DPRK who turned out in the struggle for putting an end to the U.S. imperialists' nuclear war threat, further demonstrating the independent dignity and indomitable spirit of Juche Korea and attaining the target of grains production.
					
					 The letter expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the Uganda Farm and Agro-Based Workers' Union and the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea would grow stronger and the solidarity activities would become more brisk.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory Day Observed by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Korean People's Victory Day Observed by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, August 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the 64th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The July 26th issue of the Lao newspaper Congtap Pasason Lao carried an article titled "Rare strategist" illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The paper said that it would be unthinkable without Kim Il Sung's rare military stratagem that the Korean people won historic victory by smashing the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in the Fatherland Liberation War. It noted that he forced the enemies to suffer repeated setbacks by drawing up his original tactical plans at every stage of the war.
					
					 The July 25th issue of the Tanzanian newspaper Uhuru allotted one whole page to an article titled "July 27, the victory day" illustrated with a photo of Kim Il Sung and articles subtitled "July 27 of war victory" and "July 27 of eternal victory".
					
					 The August issue of the Peruvian newspaper La Patria edited an article titled "North Korea defeated the U.S. in the 1950-1953 war" illustrated with a photo of Kim Il Sung and introduced the phenomenal successes registered by the service personnel and people of the DPRK and the U.S. imperialists' miserable defeat in the period of the war.
					
					 The July 25th issue of the Egyptian newspaper Al Akhbar Almassay carried an article titled "Great victory won by the Korean people".
					
					 The July 26th issue of the Bangladesh newspaper Daily Nauroz in an article titled "Lesson from the U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo referred to the incident of the spy ship which recorded shameful defeat in the U.S. imperialists' history of aggression upon Korea. It said:
					
					 Through the incident, the DPRK fully demonstrated its mettle in which it struggles against those who encroached upon its sovereignty to the end.
					
					 The U.S. should draw a due lesson from this.

articles.title: Destruira con justicia la ilegal "resolucion de sancion", declara el vocero de CCPAP
articles.content:
Destruira con justicia la ilegal "resolucion de sancion", declara el vocero de CCPAP
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- El vocero del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) hizo publica hoy la declaracion que sigue:
					Estados Unidos, pais gangsteril mas descarado de este mundo, y las chusmas que obedecen a la injusticia doblegandose ante el despotismo de ese imperio americano cometieron el crimen internacional de volver a inventar el 6 de agosto la "resolucion de sancion" No.2371 contra la RPDC abusando del nombre del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Tan pronto como se fabricara la presente "resolucion de sancion", el presidente norteamericano Trump fanfarroneo como si hizo una empresa grande diciendo que habra un gran impacto economico y da su agradecimiento a China y Rusia que se colaboraron con la adopcion de la resolucion. 
					
					Por otra parte, la embajadora norteamericana en la ONU y otros sirvientes estan chismeando a porfia que el "gobierno norcoreano pagara el precio por su insistente desarrollo de misiles nucleares".
					
					A su vez, el premier japones Abe charlotea que aprecia altamente la presente "resolucion de sancion" y que esta refleja correctamente la voluntad de la sociedad internacional de acrecentar mas la presion anti-RPDC.
					
					Las pobres potencias que dieron votos a la aprobacion del documento temiendo a la amenaza de sanciones de EE.UU., justifican miserablemente sus actos diciendo que el objeto final es la solucion de asunto mediante las negociaciones aunque se necesitan tambien las sanciones.
					
					Hasta los titeres surcoreanos se portan impertinentemente cacareando que la RPDC debe aceptar con seriedad la advertencia conjunta de la sociedad internacional y cesar prontamente las imprudentes provocaciones que amenazan la paz y la seguridad internacionales.
					
					Pero, la presente "resolucion de sancion" fabricada por EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras es el producto del pavor e inquietud de EE.UU. tan atemorizado ante el poderio de la RPDC que se situo en la posicion estrategica de la potencia nuclear del Juche y la militar de talla mundial. Tambien, no pasa de ser una desesperacion agonica de las fuerzas hostiles empaquetada con el nombre de la "sociedad internacional" y deviene el estigma dejado en la frente de ONU debido a la debilidad y vileza de los fulanos y menganos que dieron la aprobacion a sabiendas de su caracter injusto por temor a EE.UU, viejo lobo sin dientes.
					
					En reflejo de la firme conviccion y la irrefrenable voluntad de represalia del ejercito y pueblo de Corea que desean la paz y la seguridad de la region y el resto del mundo, el CCPAP aclara la siguiente posicion:
					
					1.   Condenamos de manera total y dura la presente "resolucion de sancion" inventada por la iniciativa de los imperialistas yanquis y por la cooperacion de los viles perseguidores calificandola del peor crimen terrorista de categoria especial contra la digna RPDC.
					
					En ninguna pagina de la Carta de la ONU y del Codigo Internacional hay un parrafo que permite cuestionar las medidas de fortalecimiento del poderio militar de un pais para defender su dignidad y soberania.
					
					Para colmo, como lo hicieron en el pasado tambien la presente "resolucion de sancion" es el documento criminal inventado por la iniciativa de EE.UU, enemigo jurado del pueblo coreano, y, en particular, el ilegal que la ONU aprobo convirtiendose en el aparato de diablo con el extremo prejuicio y la injusticia y en el titere de EE.UU. y otras potencias abandonando su mision y deber de la organizacion para asegurar la paz y seguridad del mundo. Por tanto, no le atribuimos ningun significado a esa "resolucion", ni prestaremos oidos nada a las demandas por su ejecucion.
					
					Seria una gran equivocacion si esperan que esa "resolucion", monton de crimenes, diera algun "impacto" a alguien y trajera un supuesto resultado.
					
					2.   Puesto que se llegan al climax los actos gangsteriles para aplastar despiadadamente nuestros derechos a la soberania y la existencia, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea tomaran las reales acciones justas para defenderlos.
					
					La epoca se cambio y el mundo va a despertar la conciencia.
					
					La estructura politica del mundo se transforma de manera radical segun la aspiracion del pueblo que toma la conciencia.
					
					El poderio estatal universal y la posicion estrategica de la RPDC se llegaron al plano extraordinariamente alto.
					
					En este tiempo el ejercito y pueblo de Corea no pueden dejar intactos a la banda de gangsteres que tratan de arrebatar los derechos a la soberania, la existencia y el desarrollo de un pais y eliminar completamente una nacion.
					
					No deben olvidar en absoluto que se tomaran las severas medidas estrategicas incluyendo el ejercicio fisico movilizando todo el poderio estatal del pais fortalecido extraordinariamente. 
					
					3.  Aprovechamos esta oportunidad para exhortar a todos los paises y pueblos a levantarse por frustrar el despotismo y la arbitrariedad de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras que abusaron del nombre de la ONU ante la conciencia del mundo y construir un nuevo orden mundial justo y estable.
					
					No son correctas todas las insistencias de los paises grandes, ni la mayoria puede representar la justicia. 
					
					En la Edad Media, solo unas personas insistieron en el  heliocentrismo y fueron muchos que les opusieron y reprimieron. Pero, la veracidad se ha comprobado como victoria con el transcurso de la historia. 
					
					Los paises, que esta vez recibieron el agradecimiento de Trump al dar aprobacion a la "resolucion" ilegal abandonando el credo, la conciencia y la obligacion moral y obedeciendo a EE.UU., deben sentirse la verguenza ante la conciencia mundial, reflexionar profundamente sobre sus crimenes en el tribunal de la historia y la humanidad y pagar el alto precio merecido. 
					
					Todos los paises y pueblos del mundo, que se oponen a la guerra y aman la paz, deben levantarse con valentia en la lucha antiimperialista y antiyanqui para corregir el actual orden internacional muy desigual en que la injusticia sentencia la justicia y reinan la arbitrariedad, el egoismo y la tergiversacion de la verdad, y construir un nuevo mundo justo y pacifico. 
					
					En estos momentos en que EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles se desesperan por aplastar a la RPDC, sentimos con nuestro corazon cuan justo es el camino para el fortalecimiento de fuerzas armadas nucleares optado por nosotros. Y volvemos a declarar una vez mas a todo el mundo nuestra ferrea voluntad de seguir marchando rectamente por el camino de desarrollo paralelo sin parar ni un segundo ni dar vueltas ni 1mm. 
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea frustraran duramente con la fuerza de justicia la ilegal "resolucion de sancion" fabricada por el imperialismo norteamericano.

articles.title: Comite de ASEAN en Corea ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Comite de ASEAN en Corea ofrece banquete
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 50 de la fundacion de la Asociacion de Naciones del Sudeste Asiatico (ASEAN), el comite de la misma en Corea ofrecio el dia 8 un banquete en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang.
					A la recepcion fueron invitados el ministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Kim Yong Jae, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Ri Kil Song, el subdirector general de Trabajo con el Cuerpo Diplomatico, Mun Jae Chol, y otros funcionarios coreanos y los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea.
					
					Estuvieron presentes el embajador indonesio en Corea, Bambang Hiendrasto quien es presidente del comite de ASEAN en Corea, el vietnamita Pham Viet Hung, el lao Phonekham Inthaboualy, el camboyano Sin Bunthoeurn y otros miembros de las embajadas de los paises miembros de ASEAN en Corea.
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos.

articles.title: Conversan en Pyongyang el vicepremier coreano y el ministro de Guinea Ecuatorial
articles.content:
Conversan en Pyongyang el vicepremier coreano y el ministro de Guinea Ecuatorial
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 8 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre el vicepremier y ministro de Agricultura, Ko In Ho, y el ministro de Agricultura, Ganaderia y Alimentacion, Victor Grange Mehile, que preside la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial de visita en Corea.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes, por la parte coreana, los funcionarios interesados, y por la contraparte, el miembro de la delegacion gubernamental.
					
					  Fueron discutidos los problemas para fortalecer y desarrollar las relaciones de cooperacion entre los dos paises en el sector agricola.

articles.title: Llegan a Pyongyang Daniel Jean y su comitiva
articles.content:
Llegan a Pyongyang Daniel Jean y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- Arribaron el dia 8 a esta capital Daniel Jean, enviado especial y asesor de Seguridad Nacional del premier de Canada, y su comitiva.

articles.title: Editados nuevos sellos para conmemorar lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-14"
articles.content:
Editados nuevos sellos para conmemorar lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-14"
Pyongyang, 8 de agosto (ACNC) -- Se dieron a luz en Corea nuevos sellos (dos papeles enterizos de pequeno tamano, un papel enterizo y un sello individual) para conmemorar el exito en el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-14". 
					En la parte superior de ellos se lee esta frase: "Exito del lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental 'Hwasong-14'".
					
					Un papel enterizo de pequeno tamano contiene el sello que lleva en su centro la imagen del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dando el 3 de julio del 106 (2017) de la Era Juche la orden escrita de ejecutar el lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-14". Ademas, estan dibujados la bandera del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el documento firmado por el y el cohete balistico intercontinental que sube al cielo dejando una estela de fuego. 
					
					En el otro papel enterizo de pequeno tamano, que tiene en su trasfondo la bandera nacional, el ICBM en vuelo y el globo terraqueo, se ve el Maximo Dirigente declarando el exito de lanzamiento. 
					
					El papel enterizo demuestra el proceso de lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-14" y el individual describe el curso de su vuelo. 
					
					Nuevos sellos apuntan que el exito en el disparo de "Hwasong-14", puerta final para completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, constituye una victoria fulminante de la Corea del Juche en el enfrentamiento antiimperialista y antiyanqui.
